title: Gateways
description: Between Heaven and Hell, Stands Humanity...  Several years after the incident in Nebraska that left her emotionally and physically scarred, Andrea McCloud focuses on living a normal life. But when fate intervenes and comes knocking on Andrea's door, her life is thrown back into the fire. Her son is kidnapped by a society of men hellbent on plunging the world into eternal darkness. With the help of Danny Samson and a few new allies, Andrea must uncover the secrets surrounding her son's kidnapping and help stop the worst possible outcome: The Apocalypse.  Demon Blood: Gateways is a 90,000 word horror novel. It is book two in the series.
author: Tim   Meyer
